page_content:
Here is the modified document:

 [102] R. J. Durrant and A. Kaban, “Defining Relevant Neighborhoods:
A Theoretical Framework and Implications,” Journal of Complexity,
vol. 25, no. 4, pp. 385-397, August 2009.

 [103] E. Cantu-Paz and D. E. Goldberg, “Scalability Analysis of Parallel
Genetic Algorithms: A Comparative Study,” Evolutionary Computation,
vol. 7, no. 4, pp. 429-449, December 1999.

 [104] M. Munetomo, N. Murao, and K. Akama, “Experimental Evaluation
of Parallel Linkage Identification Strategies in Large-Scale Optimization,” 
Parallel Problem Solving From Nature, Springer, Heidelberg, Germany,
pp. 322-331, 2004.

 [105] A. Mendiburu, J. A. Lozano, and J. Miguel-Alonso, “A GPU-Based
Implementation of EDAs using Probabilistic Graphical Models,” IEEE 
Transactions on Evolutionary Computation, vol. 9, no. 4, pp. 406-423,
August 2005.

 [106] S. Iturriaga and S. Nesmachnow, “Solving Complex Optimization
Problems with High-Dimensional Spaces using Parallel Computing Architectures,” 
7th International Conference on P2P, Parallel Grid Cloud Internet Comput., 
pp. 267-272, 2012.
